ActJudges Act
PrecisGranting of a LEAVE OF ABSENCE to nine Judges, from September 1, 2007 to March 31, 2008, in order to allow them to participate in the NATIONAL JUDICIAL STUDY LEAVE FELLOWSHIP PROGRAM.
